dmca.title: Fraud site - www.nxsinternational.com
dmca.body:
It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.nxsinternational.com  This
site was recently taken down by Coreix Limited and now you have it.

 

This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services providers, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES") and EC Services Corporation ("ECSC").  It has been brought
to our attention that your company provides services to a website,
www.nxsinternational.com  which is infringing on Escrow.com's intellectual
property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com
<http://www.escrow.com/> ).  This site has stolen content from Escrow.com
for the purpose of defrauding consumers attempting to buy and sell over the
Internet.  Please disable this site immediately

 

Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
<http://www.nxsinternational.com> www.nxsinternational.com  site, please
click on faq's. Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with
<http://www.nxsinternational.com> www.nxsinternational.com and has a good
faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.  

 

The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.  

 

 
Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811
